intro: Limodorum abortivum, commonly known as the abortive lily of the valley, is a herbaceous perennial plant native to the mountainous regions of Europe. The plant typically grows in shaded, moist environments such as woodlands and rocky slopes. Its leaves are elongated and strap-like, often forming a basal rosette.
